main event: Two to three large flashing lights were observed moving across the sky in Grand Rapids, Michigan on October 2, 1961.
interesting points: The lights were initially observed hovering before moving slowly in view., The duration of the observation was about 20 minutes., The lights were seen moving from east to west near the airport., An individual reported seeing the lights, but they are no longer available for further information., There is no physical report available for submission with the case, leaving it listed as possibly unknown.
sighted object: two to three large flashing lights in the sky
witness description: an individual who advised of the sighting
